note.p: Servant. Born in Llandudno, Denbighshire, Wales. Employed by CD as a stableman and coachman from at least 1858 until 1862.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/462/75/10)
letters from Emma Darwin to W. E. Darwin, [12 October 1858] (DAR 210.6: 30) and [2 March 1862] (DAR 219.1: 49)
